channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: An Evening with Glen Campbell
channel.desc: A special concert recorded at the Royal Festival Hall in 1977, where 80 musicians played new arrangements of Glen Campbell's hit songs.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Tammy
channel.desc: Nashville star Tammy Wynette and her band The Tennessee Gentlemen entertain an audience of country music fans at The Maltings in Suffolk. With guests The Frank Jennings Syndicate.

channel.title: Crystal Gayle
channel.desc: American country music singer Crystal Gayle in concert at Snape Maltings, Suffolk.

channel.title: Country Music by Ken Burns
channel.desc: How so-called hillbilly music reached new listeners and launched its first stars' careers.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Country Music by Ken Burns
channel.desc: How Nashville was transformed into Music City as America fell for Texas swing.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Glen Campbell
channel.desc: Documentary telling Glen Campbell's life story, from impoverished childhood to success as a guitarist and singer, fall from grace in the 80s and Alzheimer's diagnosis in 2011.

channel.title: Dickie Bird

channel.desc: Bryan Magee and guest Anthony Kenny discuss the work of the medieval philosophers and the contribution of figures such as St Augustine and Thomas Aquinas.

channel.desc: Joseph Cooper invites viewers to match their musical wits against Judith Jackson, Robin Ray and Patrick Moore. With guest musician Louis Kentner.

channel.title: Mr Nobody Against Putin - Storyville
channel.desc: A Storyville documentary that follows a Russian schoolteacher as he risks everything to expose rising militarism in his classroom.
